title: New development blueprint uplifts business leaders, entrepreneurs across Taiwan Strait
content:
The Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee's proposals for formulating a new five-year development plan and long-range objectives open up tremendous opportunities for enterprises from both the mainland and Taiwan, said participants attending the 2020 conference of the summit for entrepreneurs across the Taiwan Strait.
Despite the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, the conference, held in the coastal city of Xiamen in Fujian Province and Taipei via video link Wednesday, attracted more than 700 attendees from both sides of the Strait.
